SELECT s.id, s.name, IFNULL(SUM(d.count), 0) AS saleVolume FROM tb_sku AS s LEFT JOIN tb_order_item AS d ON s.name = d.sku_name
s.id in (#{ids})
GROUP BY s.name

SELECT s.id, s.name, t.item_id, p.name as shopName FROM tb_sku AS s LEFT JOIN tb_model as t on s.name = t.sku_name left join tb_shop as p on t.shop_id = p.shop_id
s.id in (#{ids})
group by s.name, t.item_id
